arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – The referee for the 10th day’s match has been appointed, his statistics
arts.sum: This Wednesday, as part of Matchday 10 of the 2025–2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lorient (8th) at the Stade du Moustoir (kick-off at 7 p.m., CET). The referee for the match has been announced: Willy Delajod (33 years old). Despite his relatively young age, Delajod already has 130 Ligue 1 matches […]

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Pantaloni “We’re going into this with confidence that we can do it.”
arts.sum: This Wednesday at 7 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lorient (16th) at the Stade du Moustoir in the 10th round of Ligue 1 2025-2026. At a press conference, Lorient coach Olivier Pantaloni spoke about the match and the Parisian opponent, sharing his expectations, hopes and, inevitably, a certain amount of apprehension about facing […]

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Follow Paris Saint-Germain’s training session this Tuesday
arts.sum: This Tuesday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will be training at the PSG Campus at 11 a.m. to prepare for Wednesday evening’s match against Lorient (16th) at the Stade du Moustoir on the 10th day of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 7 p.m., CET). The club is offering live coverage of the session:

Lorient sit in 16th place in Ligue 1 ahead of this fixture, having failed to win in their previous three games. Their last win came back in September, beating Monaco 3-1. PSG are top of the table aft...
